books.author: by Jim Butcher
books.description: The Chicago wizard Harry Dresden is forced to help an enemy break into a high-security vault; the 15th Dresden Files novel.
books.name: SKIN GAME

books.author: by James Patterson and Maxine Paetro
books.description: With the return of a killer who was presumed dead, the San Francisco detective Lindsay Boxer and the Women’s Murder Club take action.
books.name: UNLUCKY 13

books.author: by Christine Feehan
books.description: Kidnapped and held aboard a ship, Airiana must rely on Maxim, one of the feared Prakenskii brothers.
books.name: AIR BOUND

books.author: by Clive Cussler and Graham Brown
books.description: Kurt Austin, Joe Zavala and the rest of the NUMA crew investigate a sinister organization responsible for vanishing scientists, suspicious accidents and a human trafficking ring.
books.name: GHOST SHIP

books.author: by Donna Tartt
books.description: A painting smuggled out of the Metropolitan Museum of Art after a bombing becomes a boy’s prize, guilt and burden.
books.name: THE GOLDFINCH

books.author: by John Sandford
books.description: Lucas Davenport investigates when multiple bodies are found in the middle of the Minnesota cornfields.
books.name: FIELD OF PREY

books.author: by Emily Giffin
books.description: A woman who has grown up and made her life in a small, football-obsessed Texas town begins to expand her horizons.
books.name: THE ONE AND ONLY

books.author: by Susan Mallery
books.description: Dellina Hopkins finds that storing gowns from a friend's bridal boutique scares off her first and only fling.
books.name: BEFORE WE KISS

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: As the government hit man Will Robie and his partner, Jessica Reel, prepare for a mission, they face a new adversary.
books.name: THE TARGET

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by Anthony Doerr
books.description: The lives of a blind French girl and a gadget-obsessed German boy before and during World War II.
books.name: ALL THE LIGHT WE CANNOT SEE

books.author: by Christina Baker Kline
books.description: A historical novel about orphans swept off the streets of New York and sent to the Midwest in the 1920s.
books.name: ORPHAN TRAIN

books.author: by Dan Brown
books.description: The symbologist Robert Langdon, on the run in Florence, must decipher a series of codes created by a Dante-loving scientist.
books.name: INFERNO

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: A woman’s life is upended when she discovers a letter from her husband she was not meant to read until after his death.
books.name: THE HUSBAND'S SECRET

books.author: by Hazel Gaynor
books.description: Long-held secrets revealed by a survivor of the Titanic change the life of her great-granddaughter.
books.name: THE GIRL WHO CAME HOME
